## CliOptions.baseUrl property

Base URL for the entire website.

**Signature:**

```typescript
baseUrl: string;
```

## Remarks

Defines the root URL path for the website, typically '/' for root deployment or '/project-name/' for GitHub Pages or similar hosting.
